mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USER_BOOK ( ISBN13, USER_ID, STATUS, SCORE, START_DATE, END_DATE ) VALUES ( #{isbn13}, #{userId}, #{status}, #{score}, #{startDate}, #{endDate} ) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE STATUS = #{status}, SCORE = #{score}, START_DATE = #{startDate}, END_DATE = #{endDate}

INSERT INTO USER_BOOK_D ( ISBN13, TITLE, AUTHOR, COVER, PUB_DATE, DESCRIPTION, PRICE_STANDARD, CATEGORY_NAME, PUBLISHER, ITEM_PAGE ) VALUES ( #{isbn13}, #{title}, #{author}, #{cover}, #{pubDate}, #{description}, #{priceStandard}, #{categoryName}, #{publisher}, #{itemPage} )
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM USER_BOOK_D WHERE ISBN13 = #{isbn13}

SELECT UB.ISBN13, UB.STATUS, UB.SCORE, UB.START_DATE, UB.END_DATE, UBD.TITLE, UBD.AUTHOR, UBD.COVER, UBD.PUB_DATE, UBD.DESCRIPTION, UBD.PRICE_STANDARD, UBD.CATEGORY_NAME, UBD.PUBLISHER, UBD.ITEM_PAGE FROM USER_BOOK UB INNER JOIN USER_BOOK_D UBD ON UB.ISBN13 = UBD.ISBN13 WHERE UB.ISBN13 = #{isbn13} AND UB.USER_ID = #{userId}
